text: 2.23 Sng 7.9, 62.12, Jer 11.20, 17.10, Lom 8.27, 2 Ko 5.10, 2 Ti 4.14, Lep 20.12-13 Ñapay ne okok kɨlop paklen kumnɨgabal. Kumnɨgabal ak nɨm, binɨb yad man keke mɨdebal tek, yɨp nɨgtep gɨl agɨnɨgabal, Ne gos tɨmud nab kɨlop ayaŋ nɨgtep yɨbɨl gɨl nep, binɨb okok bɨlokup agɨnɨgabal agak. Anɨgɨpin tek, nɨbi nɨnokom mɨdupsek gɨpɨm tek nɨŋɨd, anɨb ak tek nɨbop pen ñɨnɨgayn agak.
